character_name: Alejandro Murrieta / Zorro:Banderas was paid $5 million for the role. The character of Alejandro Murrieta was conceived as the fictional brother of the real-life Joaquin Murrieta
Don Diego de la Vega / Zorro:Hopkins was cast in December 1996
Elena Montero:The actress signed on in November 1996
Don Rafael Montero:Armand Assante had initially been cast in the role
Esperanza De La Vega: Don Diego's beloved wife and Elena's mother
